description:
##### 50% Off #####
* Are you planning your next trip? My Vacation will help you to organize your trip.
    * My Vacations will help you to organize your trip in days, and this app will support Text or Pictures or Audio or Video data or any combination of above formats.
    * This app will record the basic tour information like tour name, place, date, tour pic, and description. This using this application you can record unlimited trips or Tours.
    * This app will allow you to search by tours and days info.
    * You can view your tour or vacation activities just by clicking your vacation.
    * This app will automatically add the day information depending upon your tour dates. So no need to add again the day logs.
    * This app can allow you to delete and edit the default day logs.
    * By using this app, you can add the unlimited pic’s, audio and video’s in a vacations.
    * User-friendly and Easy to use.



Features:

    * This app is perfect for all palm users.
    * By using this you can record unlimited vacations.
    * You can review your tour very easily just by clicking your vacation.
    * You can send email to your dearest ones.
    * User- friendly interface, Easy to use.
